author: Opentrons
description:
This protocol automates the Zymo Quick-DNA/RNA Viral MagBead Extraction Kit. This kit is designed for high-throughput purification of viral DNA and/or RNA and the isolated nucleic acids are ready for all downstream applications, such as RT-qPCR, Next-Gen Sequencing, and many others.

This kit can be used for Station B (RNA extraction) as part of our COVID Workstation.


To purchase consumables, labware, or pipettes, please visit our online store or contact our sales team at info@opentrons.com

Opentrons OT-2
Opentrons OT-2 Run App (Version 3.16.0 or later)
Opentrons Magnetic Module
Opentrons Temperature Module with 96-Well Aluminum Block
Opentrons P20 Single-Channel Pipette
Opentrons P300 8-Channel Pipette, Gen 2
Opentrons 200µL Filter Tips
Opentrons 20µL Filter Tips
Opentrons 4-in-1 Tube Rack with 24-Well Top
NEST 1.5mL Microcentrifuge Tubes
NEST 96-Deepwell Plate, 2mL
NEST 96-Well PCR Plate
NEST 12-Well Reservoir, 15mL
NEST 1-Well Reservoir, 195mL
Zymo Quick-DNA/RNA Viral MagBead Kit
Ethanol, 95-100%
Sample, 400µL per well



Note - Before running this protocol, make sure you clean the OT-2. For more information on cleaning the OT-2, check out this guide.

The setup for this protocol varies slightly, depending on the number of samples the user selects.

Labware Setup

Slot 2: NEST 12-Well Reservoir, 15mL with reagents (see below)

Slot 3: Opentrons Temperature Module with 96-Well Aluminum Block with clean and empty NEST 96-Well PCR Plate

Slot 4: Opentrons Magnetic Module with NEST 96-Deepwell Plate, 2mL, containing samples
Samples should be loaded in odd-numbered columns only

Slot 5: Opentrons 20µL Filter Tips

Slot 8: Opentrons 4-in-1 Tube Rack with 24-Well Top, containing reagents in NEST 1.5mL Microcentrifuge Tubes (see below)

Opentrons 200µL Filter Tips
 if 8 samples, Slot 1
 if 16 samples, Slots 1 and 6
 if 24 samples, Slots 1, 6, and 9
 if 32 samples, Slots 1, 6, 7, and 9
 if 40 or 48 samples, Slots 1, 6, 7, 9, and 10


Reagent Setup

Opentrons 4-in-1 Tube Rack with 24-Well Top
D1: Proteinase K, 4µL per sample
D6: Extraction Control Spike-In, if using

NEST 12-Well Reservoir, 15mL
For every 8 samples, the following reagents are needed:
 7mL Zymo Viral DNA/RNA Buffer + 350µL of Zymo MagBeads
 4.5mL of Zymo Wash Buffer 1
 4.5mL of Zymo Wash Buffer 2
 4.5mL of Ethanol (Ethanol Wash 1)
* 4.5mL Ethanol (Ethanol Wash 2)

Slot 1: Zymo Viral DNA/RNA Buffer + Zymo MagBeads, 8/16 samples
Slot 2: Zymo Viral DNA/RNA Buffer + Zymo MagBeads, 24/32 samples
Slot 3: Zymo Viral DNA/RNA Buffer + Zymo MagBeads, 40/48 samples
Slot 4: Zymo Wash Buffer 1, 8/16/24 samples
Slot 5: Zymo Wash Buffer 1, 32/40/48 samples
Slot 6: Zymo Wash Buffer 2, 8/16/24 samples
Slot 7: Zymo Wash Buffer 2, 32/40/48 samples
Slot 8: Ethanol (Ethanol Wash 1), 8/16/24 samples
Slot 9: Ethanol (Ethanol Wash 1), 32/40/48 samples
Slot 10: Ethanol (Ethanol Wash 2), 8/16/24 samples
Slot 11: Ethanol (Ethanol Wash 2), 32/40/48 samples
Slot 12: Nuclease-Free Water, 3.5-4mL

Full Deck Layout:

Using the customizations fields, below set up your protocol.
 Number of Samples: Specify the number of samples you'd like to run.
 Amount of Spike-in: Specify how much control RNA (or other spike-in) should be added to each well. If not using a spike-in, leave as 0.
* Return tips after wash step: Specify whether to drop tips into trash bin after use, or to replace in tip rack for easy disposal.

markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description:
This protocol automates the [Zymo Quick-DNA/RNA Viral MagBead Extraction Kit](https://www.zymoresearch.com/collections/quick-dna-rna-viral-kits/products/quick-dna-rna-viral-magbead). This kit is designed for high-throughput purification of viral DNA and/or RNA and the isolated nucleic acids are ready for all downstream applications, such as RT-qPCR, Next-Gen Sequencing, and many others.

This kit can be used for Station B (RNA extraction) as part of our [COVID Workstation](). --- ![Materials Needed](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/001-General+Headings/materials.png) To purchase consumables, labware, or pipettes, please visit our [online store](https://shop.opentrons.com/) or contact our sales team at [info@opentrons.com](mailto:info@opentrons.com) * [Opentrons OT-2](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/ot-2-robot/products/ot-2) * [Opentrons OT-2 Run App (Version 3.16.0 or later)](https://opentrons.com/ot-app/) * [Opentrons Magnetic Module](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/magdeck) * [Opentrons Temperature Module with 96-Well Aluminum Block](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/tempdeck) * [Opentrons P20 Single-Channel Pipette](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/ot-2-pipettes/products/single-channel-electronic-pipette) * [Opentrons P300 8-Channel Pipette, Gen 2](https://opentrons.com/pipettes/) * [Opentrons 200µL Filter Tips](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips) * [Opentrons 20µL Filter Tips](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips) * [Opentrons 4-in-1 Tube Rack with 24-Well Top](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/racks-and-adapters/products/tube-rack-set-1) * [NEST 1.5mL Microcentrifuge Tubes](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/tubes/products/nest-microcentrifuge-tubes) * [NEST 96-Deepwell Plate, 2mL](https://labware.opentrons.com/nest_96_wellplate_2ml_deep?category=wellPlate) * [NEST 96-Well PCR Plate](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/lab-plates/products/nest-0-1-ml-96-well-pcr-plate-full-skirt) * [NEST 12-Well Reservoir, 15mL](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/reservoirs/products/nest-12-well-reservoir-15-ml) * [NEST 1-Well Reservoir, 195mL](https://labware.opentrons.com/nest_1_reservoir_195ml?category=reservoir) * [Zymo Quick-DNA/RNA Viral MagBead Kit](https://www.zymoresearch.com/collections/quick-dna-rna-viral-kits/products/quick-dna-rna-viral-magbead) * Ethanol, 95-100% * Sample, 400µL per well --- ![Setup](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/001-General+Headings/Setup.png) Note - Before running this protocol, make sure you clean the OT-2. For more information on cleaning the OT-2, check out [this guide](https://support.opentrons.com/en/articles/1795522-cleaning-your-ot-2).

The setup for this protocol varies slightly, depending on the number of samples the user selects.

**Labware Setup**

Slot 2: [NEST 12-Well Reservoir, 15mL](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/reservoirs/products/nest-12-well-reservoir-15-ml) with reagents (see below)

Slot 3: [Opentrons Temperature Module with 96-Well Aluminum Block](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/tempdeck) with clean and empty [NEST 96-Well PCR Plate](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/lab-plates/products/nest-0-1-ml-96-well-pcr-plate-full-skirt)

Slot 4: [Opentrons Magnetic Module](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/magdeck) with [NEST 96-Deepwell Plate, 2mL](https://labware.opentrons.com/nest_96_wellplate_2ml_deep?category=wellPlate), containing samples*
Samples should be loaded in odd-numbered columns only
Slot 5: [Opentrons 20µL Filter Tips](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips)

Slot 8: [Opentrons 4-in-1 Tube Rack with 24-Well Top](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/racks-and-adapters/products/tube-rack-set-1), containing reagents in [NEST 1.5mL Microcentrifuge Tubes](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/tubes/products/nest-microcentrifuge-tubes) (see below)

[Opentrons 200µL Filter Tips](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips)
* if 8 samples, Slot 1 * if 16 samples, Slots 1 and 6 * if 24 samples, Slots 1, 6, and 9 * if 32 samples, Slots 1, 6, 7, and 9 * if 40 or 48 samples, Slots 1, 6, 7, 9, and 10

**Reagent Setup**

[Opentrons 4-in-1 Tube Rack with 24-Well Top](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/racks-and-adapters/products/tube-rack-set-1)
D1: *Proteinase K*, 4µL per sample
D6: *Extraction Control Spike-In*, if using

[NEST 12-Well Reservoir, 15mL](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/reservoirs/products/nest-12-well-reservoir-15-ml)
For every 8 samples, the following reagents are needed: * 7mL Zymo Viral DNA/RNA Buffer + 350µL of Zymo MagBeads * 4.5mL of Zymo Wash Buffer 1 * 4.5mL of Zymo Wash Buffer 2 * 4.5mL of Ethanol (Ethanol Wash 1) * 4.5mL Ethanol (Ethanol Wash 2)
Slot 1: Zymo Viral DNA/RNA Buffer + Zymo MagBeads, 8/16 samples
Slot 2: Zymo Viral DNA/RNA Buffer + Zymo MagBeads, 24/32 samples
Slot 3: Zymo Viral DNA/RNA Buffer + Zymo MagBeads, 40/48 samples
Slot 4: Zymo Wash Buffer 1, 8/16/24 samples
Slot 5: Zymo Wash Buffer 1, 32/40/48 samples
Slot 6: Zymo Wash Buffer 2, 8/16/24 samples
Slot 7: Zymo Wash Buffer 2, 32/40/48 samples
Slot 8: Ethanol (Ethanol Wash 1), 8/16/24 samples
Slot 9: Ethanol (Ethanol Wash 1), 32/40/48 samples
Slot 10: Ethanol (Ethanol Wash 2), 8/16/24 samples
Slot 11: Ethanol (Ethanol Wash 2), 32/40/48 samples
Slot 12: Nuclease-Free Water, 3.5-4mL

**Full Deck Layout:** ![Deck Layout](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/zymo-rna-extraction/zymo_48_layout.png) __Using the customizations fields, below set up your protocol.__ * **Number of Samples**: Specify the number of samples you'd like to run. * **Amount of Spike-in**: Specify how much control RNA (or other spike-in) should be added to each well. If not using a spike-in, leave as 0. * **Return tips after wash step**: Specify whether to drop tips into trash bin after use, or to replace in tip rack for easy disposal.
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the [Troubleshooting Survey](https://protocol-troubleshooting.paperform.co/).
markdown.process:
1. Input your protocol parameters.
2. Download your protocol.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Hit "Run".
